card-1.title: Knowledge is power
card-1.description: Empowering minds with knowledge leads to endless possibilities.

card-2.title: Creativity is key.
card-2.description: In a world of repetition, original thought unlocks unparalleled potential.

card-3.title: Change to grow.
card-3.description: Embracing evolution propels us forward, making stagnation a memory.

card-4.title: Learn, shine, rise.
card-4.description: Embrace new knowledge, illuminate your strengths, and ascend to greatness.

fill-form-video-short.title: Do you want choose type video upload ?
fill-form-video-short.description: Unlock the versatility of video uploads with our two distinct options: Public and Private. With the Public option, users can freely share their videos, fostering a sense of community and collaboration. Meanwhile, the Private option offers an added layer of security, ensuring that only authorized individuals have access to your valuable content.
